AUTH_DESC: Sign in with your ArcGIS account in order to configure or launch new open data sites. If you are are not a member of an organization, or do not have access privileges, you can still use Open Data from public Organization sites.
PAGE_UNSUPPORTED_P1: The ArcGIS Open Data administration application needs to communicate with number of back-end servers on different domains, your browser lacks this capability.
PAGE_UNSUPPORTED_P2: The good news is that there are a number of browsers which do support this type of communication.
PAGE_ACCESS_DENIED_P1: Your account does not have access to the ArcGIS Open Data administration application.
PAGE_ACCESS_DENIED_P2: Please request access from your organization administrator.
PAGE_ADMIN_ERROR_P1: Sorry about this, it very rarely happens, but something has gone wrong in our back-end services. Issues have been generated and our staff are working to figure out what's happend.
PAGE_NO_OPENDATA_P1: Your organization has not enabled Open Data. Open Data sites can not be created until this step is completed. Please see the documentation for instructions.
DASH_QUICK_START_MSG: Looks like youâ€™re new around here. Let us help you get started.
DASH_OPEN_DATA_NOT_CONFIGURED: is not enabled for Open Data.
DASH_ADD_TEAM: Add more people to your Open Data team by configuring their roles.
DASH_START_SHARING: Enable your groups for Open Data and start sharing your items.
DASH_OPEN_DATA_CATALOG_DESC: Here you can discover and explore all the open data published by ArcGIS Online organizations. Once you publish your open data it will show up here as well as on your organization sites. Check out the site to see what others are sharing today.
DASH_OPEN_DATA_CATALOG_BTN: Browse the ArcGIS Open Data Catalog
EDIT_MSG_DIRTY: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave the page?
EDIT_MSG_VALIDATION_ERR: Validation errors occured. Please make changes and re-submit.
EDIT_MSG_XHRFAIL_ERR: Sorry, something has gone wrong and we could not store your changes. Please try again later.
GROUPS_DESCRIPTION: Choose Open Data groups to make accessible in your site. Changes are automatically saved.
GROUPS_NO_OPEN_DATA: Your Organization has not marked any groups as Open Data. This can be done via the ArcGIS Online interface
GROUPS_NO_GROUPS_ASSIGNED: In order to display datasets, one or more Open Data groups must be associated with this site. Select groups from the list and click 'Add to Site'
GROUP_DETAIL_MODAL_NO_MAP_SERVICES: No Map Services in this Group.
GROUP_DETAIL_MODAL_NO_FEATURE_SERVICES: No Feature Services in this Group.
LAYOUT_HEADER_DESIGNER_DISABLED: The HTML for the header has been customized, and thus the designer has been disabled. Please switch to the Custom HTML tab to edit the header.
LAYOUT_BETA_MESSAGE: We have upgraded the homepage layout desinger, but all your customizations made during the beta period are still available via the custom HTML tab.
LAYOUT_HOMEPAGE_MAP_DESCRIPTION: The map on the homepage can be disabled (hidden), or configured to display a series of datasets, transitioning 10 seconds after the dataset is loaded. Details about the dataset will be shown in an overlay on the map. To configure this option, provide search infomation below. Then, when the map initializes on your live site, that search will be run against your open data datasets, and the first 5 results will be used.
LAYOUT_HOMEPAGE_MAP_ENABLE_TT: If enabled a map showing datasets will be visible on the site homepage.
LAYOUT_HOMEPAGE_MAP_SEARCH_TT: Enter a Search term just like you would use when searching your Open Data site.
LAYOUT_HOMEPAGE_MAP_NUMBER_OF_DATASETS_R: Number of results must be between 0 and 10
LAYOUT_HOMEPAGE_DESIGNER_DISABLED: The HTML for the homepage has been customized, and thus the designer has been disabled. Please switch to the Custom HTML tab to edit the homepage.
LAYOUT_FOOTER_DESIGNER_DISABLED: The HTML for the footer has been customized, and thus the designer has been disabled. Please switch to the Custom HTML tab to edit the footer.
LAYOUT_ROW_UP_TT: Move the below content block up
LAYOUT_ROW_DOWN_TT: Move the below content block down
LAYOUT_SELECT_ROW_MODAL_INSTRUCTIONS: Choose the required row layout to add to your Open Data site layout. The selected row can be modified later.
LAYOUT_IMAGE_MODAL_IMAGE_URL_TT: Enter the URL to the image you wish to use.
LAYOUT_IMAGE_MODAL_IMAGE_ALT_TT: Alternative Text is used by screen readers and increases the accessibility of your site.
LAYOUT_IMAGE_MODAL_IMAGE_ALT_REQUIRED_ER: Please provide alternative text on images for accessibility.
LAYOUT_IMAGE_MODAL_IMAGE_TITLE_TT: Providing a title helps with search engine optimization as well as accessibility.
LAYOUT_IMAGE_MODAL_IMAGE_LINK_TT: Provide a URL to browse to when the image is clicked.
LAYOUT_MARKDOWN_MODAL_EDIT_TEXT_TT: Type the text into the input box. Markdown is supported.
LAYOUT_MARKDOWN_MODAL_EDIT_TEXT_REQUIRED: Text is required in this component.
LAYOUT_TEXT_MODAL_EDIT_TEXT_TT: Enter a single line of text.
LAYOUT_TEXT_MODAL_EDIT_TEXT_REQUIRED_ERR: Please enter some text for this component.
LAYOUT_DATALIST_MODAL_DESCRIPTION: This widget allows you to filter the datasets you want displayed on your Open Data homepage. To display all of your datasets, simply put a '*' in the search field, or leave it empty. Results can be sorted by name, date modified, date posted or popularity. Finally, select the number of results you wish to show.
LAYOUT_DATALIST_MODAL_SEARCH_TT: Enter a Search term just like you would use when searching your Open Data site.
LAYOUT_DATALIST_MODAL_NUMBER_OF_DATASETS: Choose the number of results to show in the list.
Number of results must be between 0 and 25
LAYOUT_DATALIST_MODAL_LIST_TITLE_TT: Provide a title that will be shown above the list
LAYOUT_DATA_LIST_EXAMPLE_DESC: This is the item description. It will be truncated if it is really long
LAYOUT_WEBMAP_MODAL_TITLE_ERR: Please provide a title for this map.
LAYOUT_WEBMAP_MODAL_WEBMAPID_TT: The id of the ArcGIS.com webmap you want to embed.
LAYOUT_WEBMAP_MODAL_WEBMAPID_ERR: Please provide the id of the webmap you would like to embed.
LAYOUT_WEBMAP_MODAL_HEIGHT: Height of the map, in pixels
LAYOUT_WEBMAP_MODAL_HEIGHT_RANGE_ERR: Map height must be between 300 and 800.
LAYOUT_YOUTUBE_MODAL_TITLE_ERR: Please provide a title for this video.
LAYOUT_YOUTUBE_MODAL_YOUTUBEID_TT: The id of the YouTube video you want to embed.
LAYOUT_YOUTUBE_MODAL_YOUTUBEID_ERR: Please provide the id of the YouTube video you would like to embed.
LAYOUT_YOUTUBE_MODAL_HEIGHT: Height of the video, in pixels
LAYOUT_YOUTUBE_MODAL_HEIGHT_RANGE_ERR: Video height must be between 300 and 800.
LAYOUT_DEFAULT_IMAGE_ALT: Replace this text with description of image for accessibility
LAYOUT_DEFAULT_CUSTOM_HTML_MESSAGE: If you require fine grained control over the look of your site, you may edit the HTML directly using the editor below. However, by doing this, you will no longer be able to return to the Designer view without losing your customizations.
LAYOUT_DEFAULT_DESIGNER_LOCKED_MESSAGE: You have changed Custom HTML for this section and cannot use the designer. If you Enable Designer then you will lose your Custom HTML changes.
LAYOUT_EMBED_MODAL_EDIT_CODE_TT: Copy the embed code from the 3rd party service and paste it below
LAYOUT_EMBED_MODAL_TWITTER_NOTICE: Note: Although Twitter feeds function correctly on the home page, they do not refresh consistently in this designer. This is a known issue with the Twitter embed system.
LAYOUT_FEED_MODAL_FEED_TITLE_TT: Optional Title for the Feed. Will appear above the list of items.
LAYOUT_FEED_MODAL_URL_REQUIRED_ERR: Please provide a URL to an RSS feed.
LAYOUT_FEED_MODAL_NUMBER_OF_ITEMS: Number of feed items to display
LAYOUT_FEED_MODAL_NUMBER_OF_ITEMS_RANGE_: The number of feed items must be between 1 and 20
LAYOUT_FEED_EXAMPLE_DESC: This is example content showing what your feed will look like. This is a long placeholder description for the design interface. Really long descriptions will be automatically truncated.
LAYOUT_CUSTOM_MODAL_SWITCH_BACK_WARNING: You have made changes to the HTML of this component! Switching to the designer will cause  you to lose these changes. Please confirm this action.
REPORTS_DATA_SYNC_BTN_TT: Initiate a re-index of all groups, items and services.
REPORTS_ITEM_DATASET: which is composed of a single dataset.
REPORTS_ITEM_DATASETS: which is composed of {{ dataset_count }} datasets.
REPORTS_ITEM_GROUP: It is part of one group.
REPORTS_ITEM_GROUPS: It is part of {{ group_count }} groups.
SITE_EDITOR_TAG_TT: Optional Second line in site title
SITE_EDITOR_PUBLIC_TEXT: Check box to make your site public
SITE_EDITOR_PUBLIC_TT: Public Access makes the site visible to anyone. Keep private to restrict to your organization.
SITE_EDITOR_PUBLIC_TRIAL: Trial subscriptions cannot make their sites public.
SITE_EDITOR_SITE_NAME_TT: Enter the name that appears on the browser window and welcome message.
SITE_EDITOR_SUBDOMAIN_UNIQUE_ERR: You have a site with this subdomain!
SITE_EDITOR_SUBDOMAIN_LENGTH_ERR: Subdomain must be between 1 to 63 chars long
SITE_EDITOR_SUBDOMAIN_PATTERN_ERR: Subdomains can not start or end with "-", "_", or "."
SITE_EDITOR_SUBDOMAIN_TT: Enter a name that will appear at the beginning of your organization's standard Open Data URL.
SITE_EDITOR_CUSTOM_DOMAIN_TT: Set a custom domain for your open data site. Requires DNS configuration. Please see the help.
SITE_EDITOR_CUSTOM_DOMAIN_PATTERN_ERR: Please enter a valid domain name.
SITE_EDITOR_DESC_TT: Add a description for your site to improve search engine discovery
SITE_EDITOR_LOGO_TT: If you want a logo in the header, paste the URL to an image file in this text box.
SITE_EDITOR_FAVICO_TT: If you want a custom favicon, paste the URL to a .ico file in this text box.
SITE_EDITOR_MAP_DISPLAY_TT: Should the map be displayed on the home page
SITE_EDITOR_MAP_QUERY_TT: Specify the query to locate datasets to display on the homepage map
SITE_EDITOR_MAP_SORT_TT: Specify the a sort field for the datasets to display on the homepage map
SITE_EDITOR_DEFAULT_BASEMAP_DESC: By default, Open Data will present your data on a grey basemap using the web mercator projection. Users have the option to switching to a satellite basemap that is also in web mercator. You can also opt to specify custom basemaps, which will allow you to select two basemaps from your Organization's pre-defined basemaps.
SITE_EDITOR_CUSTOM_BASEMAP_TT: The basemap that will used in all maps on your Open Data site.
SITE_EDITOR_PRIMARY_ALWAYS_REQUIRED: A primary basemap is always required.
SITE_EDITOR_PRIMARY_BASEMAP_TT: The default basemap that will be displayed when your Open Data site starts up.
SITE_EDITOR_PRIMARY_BASEMAP_LABEL_TT: Text on the link to switch to the primary basemap. Default is MAP.
SITE_EDITOR_SECONDARY_BASEMAP_PROJ_MATCH: The projection of the basemaps do not match. Please select basemaps with matching projections.
SITE_EDITOR_SECONDARY_BASEMAP_TT: The basemap that will be displayed when users choose the secondary option.
SITE_EDITOR_SECONDARY_BASEMAP_LABEL_TT: Text on the link to switch to the secondary basemap. Default is SATELLITE.
SITE_EDITOR_FLAGS_HELP: Provide new functionality on your site by enabling these new features.
SITE_EDITOR_FLAGS_CHARTS_DESC: Visualize datasets in a variety of different chart types. Selections and interactions with the chart will be reflected in the map.
SITE_EDITOR_FLAGS_ONECLICK_DESC: Provides simple styling of a dataset based on a column of choice.
SITES_LIST_DELETE_MODAL_DESC: This will permanently delete this site and all of its custom configurations. This action CANNOT be undone.
SITES_LIST_DELETE_MODAL_LABEL: Enter the site subdomain to confirm its deletion.
SITES_LIST_PRIVATE_MODAL_DESC: Making this site private will disable all public access. Only authenticated members of your ArcGIS Online organization will be able to access this site.
SITES_LIST_TRIAL_MODAL_THANKS: Thank you for your interest in Open Data
SITES_LIST_TRIAL_MODAL_MESSAGE: With a trial subscription, you are free to experiment with Open Data capabilities. However, sites cannot be made public without a paid subscription.
SITES_LIST_HARVEST_SUCCESS: All of the data registered with this site has been successfully validated and is now available.
SITES_LIST_HARVEST_WARNING: Some of the data registered with this site was unable to be validated. Please review the error report for a list of data sets that need attention.
SITES_LIST_HARVEST_ERROR: The data registered with this site was unable to be validated. Please review the error report for additional assistance.
THEME_EDITOR_DESCRIPTION: A theme is composed of a set of styles that are applied across the entire application, as well as any custom css rules your design requires.
THEME_STYLE_EDITOR_DESCRIPTION: A theme is a unified set of color schemes that you apply to your Open Data site to give them a customized appearance.
THEME_STYLE_EDITOR_HEADER_HEIGHT_TT: Height of the header in pixels
THEME_STYLE_EDITOR_HEADER_HEIGHT_RANGE_E: Header height must be between 20 and 200px.
THEME_STYLE_EDITOR_BODY_TEXT_SIZE_ERR: Font size must be between 5 and 80px
THEME_STYLE_EDITOR_HEADER_FOOTER_RANGE_E: Footer height must be between 20 and 500px
THEME_STYLE_EDITOR_FOOTER_HEIGHT_TT: Set the minium height of the footer.
THEME_STYLE_EDITOR_CUSTOM_CSS_DESCRIPTIO: Optional custom CSS to override application defaults or styles.
THEME_STYLE_EDITOR_TOOLTIP_FONTNAME: If you add a non-standard web font to this field, you will need to import it via the Custom CSS tab.
LAYOUT_MSG_URL: Source must be a valid URL
